languages.english-overview:
Framadate is an online service for planning an appointment or making a decision quickly and easily. No registration is required.
Framadate is licensed under the CeCILL-B license.

ul.li: Define dates or subjects to choose from
Send the poll link to your friends or colleagues

languages.english-exp_ad_pass: New password. Leave blank if you do not want to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_username: Please provide the username to reset the password
languages.english-err_no_such_user: The Admin username is incorrect and does not exist!
languages.english-no_pass_encrypt: Could not encrypt admin password because the domain is not pointing to the correct server
languages.english-exp_use_smtp: Only if you check this check box, SMTP authentication will be actually enabled and Framadate shall be able to send poll links to your email address!
